content: cable co technique co 1 2 3 4 5 7 8 9 11 13 sts pm round 24 - increase round #1 *k1 m1-l k to 1 st before for side co 1 2 3 4 5 7 8 9 11 13 sts turn marker m1-r k1 sm repeat from * 1 more time 4 work back over then k1 joining left back and left sts increase d 2 sts each front/back front together rnds 25-36 work in st st for 12 rnds step 3 *k across front to marker remove marker round 37 - increase round #2 *k1 m1-l k to 1 st before transfer next 38 40 42 41 43 43 46 48 48 48 marker m1-r k1 sm repeat from * 1 more time 4 sleeve sts onto holder or scrap yarn then remove sts increase d 2 sts each front/back bor marker rnds 38-49 work in st st for 12 rnds step 5 turn work over and using cable co technique co 1 2 3 4 5 7 8 9 11 13 sts pm round 50 - increase round #3 *k1 m1-l k to 1 st before for bor/side co 1 2 3 4 5 7 8 9 11 13 sts marker m1-r k1 sm repeat from * 1 more time 4 turn work back over then k1 joining right front sts increase d 2 sts each front/back - total sts each front/ and right back together back 62 68 72 78 84 90 96 100 108 116 work in st st for 2 rnds or until body meas approx total sts on needles 12 25 /31 cm from underarm or 1 25 /3 cm less each front/back 60 66 70 76 82 88 94 98 106 than desired underarm to hem length 114 total sts on needles 124 136 144 156 168 180 192 200 216 232 body hem work in st st in the round knitting every round for 16 rnds or until meas approx 3 /8 cm from switch to us 9/5 5 mm circ and remove side underarm * marker on round 1 below * if you would like to omit waist shaping then work round 1 *k2 p2 repeat from * to end in st st until meas 12 25 /31 cm or 1 25 /3 cm less than desired underarm to hem length then proceed repeat round 1 until ribbing meas approx 1 25 /3 to hem section cm bobble in pattern www elizabethsmithknits com 4 sleeves repeat for both neck ribbing with us 9/5 5 mm 16 /40 cm circ join yarn at transfer 38 40 42 41 43 43 46 48 48 48 right side of back neck sts and sleeve sts from scrap yarn onto 3 us 10/6 mm dpns or 32 /80 cm circ if using magic loop pick up and k 24 24 24 26 26 26 28 28 30 30 back neck sts step 1 join yarn at center of underarm and pick up
